titles.title: Flying Mission Oversight and Transparency Act
Flying Mission Oversight and Transparency Act
To require justification for transfer or elimination of flying missions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Flying Mission Oversight and Transparency Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense, prior to the relocation or elimination, to submit a report describing the justification for its decision to relocate or eliminate any flying mission with respect to an active or reserve component of the Army, Navy, or Air Force.
